Journal Story: The first and easiest day on the whole trail. Just started out at 2 p.m. and finished early. Lovely weather and the trail just perfect for the start. But the backpack is way to heavy.....
Destination: About 7 miles away from Springer Mountain

Journal Story: Just dried out my shoes properly, so that I can glue them. Completely wrecked in the front. There is a lovely place to shop cheaply in Bethel. A Supermarket, operated by the Mennonites. They got all you need and way cheaper than any supermarket I saw on the trail until now. I don't know, why this one is not listed in the Awol.....
You can look it all up in my Website: www.weltenbummler68.comIt was a long, hard hike up the Mt. Katahdin. But I made it !!!!158 days....wow !!!
